| History                 = The Skeleton Crew was set up as an organization by the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]]. The roster of the team initially included the leader [[Brock Rumlow (Earth-616)|Crossbones]], [[Susan Scarbo (Earth-616)|Mother Night]], [[Samuel Saxon (Earth-616)|Machinesmith]], the [[Jason Cragg (Earth-616)|Voice]], and the fourth [[Sleepers (Robots)|Sleeper]] [[Robots|robot]].{{r|Captain America #369}} These members had each repeatedly come into conflict with [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] and the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]]. Mother Night's brother, [[Melvin Scarbo (Earth-616)|Minister Blood]], assisted the Skeleton Crew on their mission against the Avengers.{{r|Avengers Vol 1 319|325}}

Crossbones was kicked off the team for questioning one of the Red Skull's commands, prompting a membership drive. [[Lucius O'Neil (Earth-616)|Mangler]], [[Tani Uiruson (Earth-616)|Deathstroke]], and [[Daniel Leighton (Earth-616)|Cutthroat]] fought for the position at Mother Night's direction, leaving only the latter still alive to join.{{r|Captain America Vol 1 394|396}} Later, [[Joseph Manfredi (Earth-616)|Blackwing]] and [[Steven Levins (Earth-616)|Jack O'Lantern]] joined the crew as well.{{r|Captain America Vol 1 398}} The Skeleton Crew was eventually defeated by Captain America with the help of [[Rachel Leighton (Earth-616)|Diamondback]] and, after they were stopped, each was sent to prison.{{r|Captain America Vol 1 409|410}}
